methodpanelconfig.name: startFileBasedProfiler
methodpanelconfig.description: Turns on BusinessEvents Profiler and starts collecting data for the specified duration. When the duration time is complete or the Profiler is turned off, profiling data will be output to a file in comma separated format

arg.name: Session
arg.desc: Name of the session (Optional if only one session exists)

arg.name: FileName
arg.desc: Name of the file to where the profiling data is output (Optional)

arg.name: Level
arg.desc: Level of depth profiling data will be collected. Pick -1 for all levels, 1 for RTC level only

arg.name: Duration
arg.desc: Time interval, in seconds, the profiling data will be collected. If LEQ 0, the profiler will be on until explicitly turned off.
